    Iâ€™m Andy, a power systems researcher & engineer and currently working as a senior researcher at MOBI research Group in Belgium. My research interest includes energy and power systems management & planning, energy markets, integration of renewable energies and e-mobility, local energy sharing, and optimization for energy applications.

    Prior to coming to Belgium, I completed my PhD in Electrical Engineering (power systems) at the UniversitÃ© Grenoble Alpes, France. I also received my MSc and BSc in Electrical Engineering from Grenoble INP and Institut Teknologi Bandung (ITB), respectively.

    Besides my research, I have been involved in various power systems projects, including interconnection and renewable-based generation feasibility studies, power plant controller, and microgrid development. Further details about me are available in my CV.

    I also like to write science and engineering articles (in Bahasa Indonesia) in my blog.
